name: LukLak
description:
This game was made for school, and had two constraints being : must not contain an objective, and has to fit in the thematic "Min/Max".

It's a First Person Sandbox game where you can apply different kinds of extravagant forces on various objects, and where you can STOP the time!!!

You can check the controls in the main menu, or by pressing "tab" once in-game.

Edouine
Game Programmer

Mario "Gigot" Nicoletti
Art Direction

Kakurenbo
Sound Designer
